I is that you can estimate a student's knowledge or ability on the Fly and then deliver a question that is at the right

a wish and trying to prove that it's a good idea and this will help minimize
the impact of confirmation bias on your decision making for example if you are currently

audit of what the current application does and what what you will be rewriting keep it small and specific with a
healthy air of skepticism stay humble while you do this the app is the way
that it is for a reason so be curious not judgmental treat the audit as a
feasibility study if there is more complexity or scope than you first envisaged be prepared to label the

writing code in our case the application was more complex than we first thought
